testcase.name: Verifying user login with correct username and password
testcase.system-out: When User navigates to the home page........................................passed And user clicks sign in button at the home page and navigates to sign in page.passed Then user verifies that sign in page header is visible......................passed And user enters username "hazel" and password "13579".......................passed And user clicks sign in button..............................................passed Then user verifies that sign in is successful...............................passed And user clicks sign out and verifies sign out..............................passed
